Central Video Privacy Protection Policy
Update date: August 05, 2022
Effective date: August 05, 2022

The "central video" software (hereinafter referred to as "this software") and related services (hereinafter referred to as "this service") refersAnd operate and label the client application named "CCTV" and the products and services provided by related websites to you.
We know the importance of personal information to you and do our best to protect your personal information security.

This privacy protection policy will explain how we will collect and collect information content and how to use your personal information in the process of using this software and related services. Please carefully read and understand before using this software and related servicesThis privacy protection policy.

The personal information of this privacy policy refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or in combination with other information with electronics or other ways to identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural persons, including names, birthdays, identity documents, individuals, individuals, and individualsBiometric information (including fingerprints and facial features), address, communication and communication contact information, account passwords, personal location information, personal common equipment information (including device MAC address, unique device recognition code)List, user nickname, user avatar, etc.

text: 3. Information security
3.1 Safety protection measures
We strive to provide protection for users' information security to prevent information leakage, loss, improper use, unauthorized access and disclosure.

We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that user personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security, including technological protection methods, management system control, and security system guarantee.
label: Data Security

text: We use industry -leading technical protection measures.
The technical means we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The technical means we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.

text: We recommend that you pay full attention to the protection of personal information when using software and services, and we will also provide multiple security functions to help you protect your personal information security.
3.2 Safety event disposal measures
If personal information leakage, damage, loss and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent the expansion of security events.

Data Security
